item.title: OpenWhisk and MQTT
item.description: OpenWhisk Feeds provide the mechanism to bind external events sources to serverless function executions. Want to use OpenWhisk to listen for database updates to generate usage statistics? Or write Slack bots that respond to trigger words? Or notify users when Github project changes? Rather than manually listening for these events with an external application and calling OpenWhisk Actions through the API, OpenWhisk Feeds automate connecting external events sources with Actions.
